programme.title: American Airlines pilots' strike
programme.short_synopsis: President Clinton halts the 1997 American Airlines pilots strike.
programme.medium_synopsis: President Clinton forgets about upsetting organised labour and chooses instead to keep American business flying by forcing a stop to the airline pilots strike.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
